name: Port of Tallinn
bossPosition: Chairman of the Management Board / CEO
goal:
The activities of Port of Tallinn are divided mainly between the following areas:
- cargo and activities related to handling it
- passengers and activities related to serving them
- real estate development
- shipping
- energetics
euInitiatives:
None at the moment. Main EU initiatives previously followed: "European Sustainable Shipping Forum subgroup Port Reception Facilities"
We are likely to join the new working group in the near future.
